text: nehamprinkeno 7nima hutere hania kafurera tamagra Hibru vahe'mota, Hibru vahe'ma zagoreti'ma mizama sesage'za, kazokazo eri'zama erisaza vahera 6si'a kafuma eri'zama eritesageta 7nima hania kafufina zamatrenke'za fru hu'za maniho hu'na hu'noanagi, ana nanekea tamagehe'za zamagesa ante'za nentahiza amagera onte'naze.
